long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome plugin used to validate Pokemon Showdown teams for custom rulesets. Currently set for use with the Omega Ultimate Battle league (https://www.draft-league.nl/league/oubl), however future revisions may be made to use with your own rulesets.
